suites.title: test case: check input field
suites.fullTitle: Testing Scholars Project test case: check input field

suites.title: test case: check placeholder
suites.fullTitle: Testing Scholars Project test case: check placeholder
suites.code:
const element = await driver.findElement(By.css('input')).getAttribute('placeholder');
assert.equal(element, "Enter your delivery address", `Ensure you have the placeholder as seen in the mock-up`);

suites.title: test case: check label of input-field
suites.fullTitle: Testing Scholars Project test case: check label of input-field
suites.code:
const element = await driver.findElement(By.css('body')).getText();
assert.include(element, "Where are you?", `Ensure you have the input field as the appropriate label as seen in the mock-up`);
